flows.description: Demo sign on flow integrating real-time password detection against known breaches.
flows.name: Ping YOUniverse - Sign On Demo

annotation.value: Check if password is on a known breach list
Check if password is on a known breach list
Send user to create a new password

flows.description: Used to check if user password has been found in a known breach.
flows.name: Subflow - Have I Been Pwned

settings.csp: worker-src 'self' blob:; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://code.jquery.com https://devsdk.singularkey.com http://cdnjs.cloudflare.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval';

nodeDescription.value: Converts the string password into an SHA1 hashed password
Returns the first 5 characters of the password hash
Make a GET request to Pwned to check the password for known breaches.
Check the known breaches to see if current password is found.
If breachCount is greater than 0, password was found in a breach.

annotation.value: Identifies if a provided password has appeared in any known data breaches                                                                                                           Created By: Brian Smith
